channel.title: [317]Cant connect to server, Even when portforwarded
channel.description:
I was able to run a few sources, but my friend wanted me to get rune-warfare, and i did, changed the client ip, and sent him the client, but he couldnt connect, so i tried changing the ip in the server from 127.0.0.1 to our server ip, and he still cant connect, this is odd, because he can connect with our other source
does anybody use rune-warfare? or have used it? if so how to i get this to work lol?
Source is Rune-Warfare

item.title: [317]Cant connect to server, Even when portforwarded

same old crap, going to test client with diffrent source, or source with another client
